content: valentine s scrunchie thank you for your interest in my pattern this pattern has not been tested so if you find typographical or numerical errors please inform me so i can correct it i can be contacted via facebook or instagram happy hooking finished size scrunchie is about 4 wide using #3 yarn materials light worsted #3 yarn or medium worsted #4 yarn 3 25mm hook if using #3 yarn or 3 5mm hook if using #4 yarn needle scissors hair elastic gauge not necessary but using #4 yarn will result in a stiffer and slightly bigger scrunchie stitches us terms slip_stitch -slip_stitch double_crochet -double_crochet st -stitch half_double_crochet -half_double_crochet chain -chain single_crochet -single_crochet pattern notes this pattern is constructed in multiple parts but requires no sewing # single_crochet means one single_crochet in each st for # of stitches chaining at the beginning of the round does not count as a stitch designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items heart tassels note you may make as many or as few tassels as you would like in as many colors as you would like step 1 in a magic_ring chain 1 3 double_crochet 2 single_crochet double_crochet 2 single_crochet 3 double_crochet chain 1 slip_stitch pull ring tight 11 step 2 chain as long as you d like the tassel to be step 3 slip_stitch to hair elastic fasten_off step 4 weave in tail at start we will work over the end tail later step 5 repeat for as many tassels you would like i made a total of six tassels in three different colors two in each color the photo to the right shows how many chains i did in step 2 for each tassel step 6 once you are done adding tassels spread them out evenly around the hair elastic as pictured below 30 40 35 50 55 60 designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items scrunchie you will be working over the end tails of the tassels and around the chains for round 1 round 1 attach yarn to hair elastic with a slip_stitch chain 1 34 single_crochet around slip_stitch to join 34 single_crochet round 2 chain 2 3 double_crochet in each st slip_stitch to first st to join 102 double_crochet round 3 chain 1 half_double_crochet in first st chain 1 skip st *half_double_crochet in next st chain 1 skip st* around slip_stitch to join 51 half_double_crochet and 51 chain round 4 slip_stitch into chain 1 space chain 1 * 2 half_double_crochet in chain 1 space skip half_double_crochet* around slip_stitch to join fasten_off 102 half_double_crochet reference photo enjoy your new valentine s scrunchie if you would like to support my designs you can buy me a coffee on venmo @thoseyellowthings designed by crochet by those_yellow_things your source for unique handmade items
